snippet: Congress should take the lead on enforcing a treaty adopted by the United Nations that cracks down on illegal fishing.
abstract: Editorial urges Congress to pass legislation to codify how to enforce the Port State Measures Agreement, treaty adopted by the United Nations to thwart poachers in ports when they try to unload ill-gotten catches; contends the United States should help lead the global effort to take the profit out of poaching.
lead_paragraph: Congress should take the lead on enforcing a treaty adopted by the United Nations that cracks down on illegal fishing.
